price: En ello hay signos [de Dios], pero [sepan que] siempre pondré a prueba [a los seres humanos].
arabic: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَٰتٖ وَإِن كُنَّا لَمُبۡتَلِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: inna fī dhālika laāyātin wa-in kunnā lamub'talīna
